question: Which of the following activities or qualities would not likely be considered part of shamanism?

answers.text: Performing rituals, a belief in animism, the practice of drumming, using hallucinogenic substances
Performing divination, healing, journeying, spiritual mediation, communicating prophecies
The Christian practice of laying on of hands and other rituals

Emerging at the periphery of organized religion and doctrine,   displaying charisma, promoting transformation or change at a societal or religious level, often influencing large groups of people and/or culture
